design_identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
anti_patterns: No generic centered layouts without tension
No purples/teals for CTAs (unless specific brand logic)

rules.text_contrast: Always use zinc-900 on light backgrounds, white on dark overlays.
rules.feedback: Green (Emerald-500) for Correct/Higher. Red (Rose-500) for Wrong/Lower.

layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for Landing Page. Split Screen (50/50) for Game.
layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12. Avoid cramped containers.
layout_strategy.mobile_first: Stack panels vertically on mobile (h-1/2 each). Side-by-side on desktop (w-1/2 each).
layout_strategy.alignment: Center content within game cards, but use asymmetry in the landing grid.

game_card.structure: Full height/width container. Background image with object-cover. Gradient overlay. Content at bottom center.
game_card.interaction: No hover on game cards themselves, but buttons float on top.

vs_badge.style: Circular, white background, thick black border (4px). Centered absolute. Z-index 50.

action_buttons.higher: bg-emerald-500 hover:bg-emerald-400 text-white rounded-full py-4 px-8 shadow-lg transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
action_buttons.lower: bg-rose-500 hover:bg-rose-400 text-white rounded-full py-4 px-8 shadow-lg transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95

landing_card.style: Bento grid item. Rounded-xl. Border-2 border-black. Hover: -translate-y-1 shadow-[8px_8px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)]. Transition-all.

animations.number_reveal: CountUp from 0 to value over 1.5s easeOut.

categories.name: Country Population
categories.description: Aerial view of crowded city night

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text over images has sufficient scrim (gradient overlay).
accessibility.keyboard_nav: Enter/Space to select Higher/Lower. Arrow keys support (Up=Higher, Down=Lower).
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable confetti and slide animations if prefers-reduced-motion is true.

instructions_to_main_agent: Install required packages: framer-motion, react-countup, canvas-confetti, lucide-react.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' from Google Fonts for all numbers and headings.
Implement the Game Loop state machine strictly: Card A (Left) vs Card B (Right/Hidden) -> User Guess -> Reveal B -> Animation -> Slide B to A -> New B.
Ensure the 'VS' circle is perfectly centered and z-indexed above the split cards.
On Mobile: Stack cards vertically. On Desktop: Split horizontally.
Hard Mode: Hides the exact number of Card A, giving only a range or partial hint (optional logic).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Avoid default shadow-sm. Use custom hard shadows for the 'Pop' effect.
All interactive elements must have data-testid.
